markdownRemark.html:
Not every Pi has Adreno GPU

  • Orange Pi = Rockchip, therefore they have Mali GPU
  • Raspberry Pi = VideoCore GPU
  • Banana Pi (BPI-M4 Berry) = Allwinner, Mali
  • BeaglePlay = CPU: Arm Cortex-A53, GPU: IMG Axe !ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
  • Nvidia Jetson Nano = obviously
  • ODROID = also Rockchip
  • Radxa NX5 IO
  • VIM3 Amlogic A311D - <$200 SBC with cortex and NPU chips by Khadas

https://rpi.science.ontariotechu.ca/lab/arm/ - gnu assembler for ARM (Raspberry Pi)
